SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client

Class ClientHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.ClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ClientHandler extends Object implements Runnable
Class that creates a new client handler that handles the messages received from the server

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ClientHandler()
     

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addMessageToQueue(Message message)
    Method to add a message to the queue of messages to handle
    void
    createConnection(int isRMI, String ip, int port, ClientInterface clientInterface)
    Method to create a new connection between a client and server and creates all the handlers in the managerHandlers class for each type of message received from the server
    void
    createMessageHandlerThread(Client client)
    Method to create a new message handler thread that handles the messages received from the server: if the client is a ClientRMI, it handles the message directly if the client is a ClientSocket, it adds the message to the queue of messages to handle
    void
    handleMessageFromServer(Message message)
    Method to handle the messages received from the server and to call the right handler for the message received
    void
    run()
    the run method of the class ClientHandler that handles the messages received from the server when the queue of messages to handle is not empty, it takes the first message from the queue and handles it

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientHandler

      public ClientHandler()

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      the run method of the class ClientHandler that handles the messages received from the server when the queue of messages to handle is not empty, it takes the first message from the queue and handles it
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • addMessageToQueue

      public void addMessageToQueue(Message message)
      Method to add a message to the queue of messages to handle
      Parameters:
      message - the message to add to the queue

    • createMessageHandlerThread

      public void createMessageHandlerThread(Client client)
      Method to create a new message handler thread that handles the messages received from the server: if the client is a ClientRMI, it handles the message directly if the client is a ClientSocket, it adds the message to the queue of messages to handle
      Parameters:
      client - the client that receives the messages from the server

    • createConnection

      public void createConnection(int isRMI, String ip, int port, ClientInterface clientInterface) throws Exception
      Method to create a new connection between a client and server and creates all the handlers in the managerHandlers class for each type of message received from the server
      Parameters:
      isRMI - 0 if the connection is a socket connection, 1 if the connection is an RMI connection
      ip - the ip of the server
      port - the port of the server
      clientInterface - the client interface of the client
      Throws:
      Exception - if there are problems with the connection

    • handleMessageFromServer

      public void handleMessageFromServer(Message message) throws Exception
      Method to handle the messages received from the server and to call the right handler for the message received
      Parameters:
      message - the message received from the server
      Throws:
      Exception - if there are problems with the connection
